alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 12:43AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Mobile, eastern George and southeastern Greene Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1242 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles north of Wade to Tanner Williams to near Theodore. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lucedale, Chunchula, Gulfcrest, Semmes, Tanner Williams, Mobile Regional Airport and Wilmer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
